job.title: Senior Data Scientist-NLP
job.description:
Our client is a household name dedicated to making an impact on their customer base. This global firm is looking a Senior Data Scientist to work in their fast-paced environment and completely transform the customer experience.    You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answers.&nbsp;You will focus on using state-of-the art Machine Learning and AI tools   Responsibilities:     - Play a crucial role in delivering advanced technology solutions that addresses real-world, data-driven needs   
  - Design and develop&nbsp;pipelines, reports,&nbsp;dashboards and framework that monitor&nbsp;and analyze&nbsp;performance of the AI Voice Agents   
  - Employ advanced statistical modeling to analyze large data sets,&nbsp;create&nbsp;dashboards&nbsp;and&nbsp;derive insights&nbsp;to guide key business,&nbsp;product&nbsp;and engineering&nbsp;decisions   
   .Skills:     - BS in Computer Science,&nbsp;Mathematics, Statistics&nbsp;or a related quantitative discipline   
  - 5+&nbsp;years of experience in data science or analytics using Python and SQL and working with big data   
  - Excellent analytical skills along with ability to solve business problems and apply innovative though leadership   
   Compensation:&nbsp;Strong Package, Bonus, equity and Benefits.
